response.secondaryText: All techniques may be absent or present to varying degrees. If a thecnique is absent, please choose 'None'.
If in the previous question you did not spot a technique (None), please choose 'Neutral / Unsure'.
For example, if the author created the visualization to intentionally mislead or lie.

response.placeholder: Enter your age here, range from 0 - 100. Insert 0 if you prefer not to say.

response.prompt: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
response.placeholder: Select the option that best represents your level. Scroll down to see all options.
Select the option that best represents your position. Scroll down to see all options.

response.prompt: Rate your expertise in **data visualization** from 1 (very poor) to 7 (excellent).
Rate your expertise in **misleading visualizations analysis** from 1 (very poor) to 7 (excellent).
Rate your expertise in visualization rhetoric from 1 (very poor) to 7 (excellent).
